subject: Re: [junit] RE: Is there a tool which generates JUnit-test stubs?
msgSnippet: ... Please describe what you find dangerous about applying test-first principles to an already developed project. Mike -- Mike Clark Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
messageBody:
Vladimir Bossicard wrote:

> Starting a new project of maintaining one are two different problems.
> The XP 'test-first' method is well suited for a new project, but can be
> dangerous is applied blindly to an already developped project.
>

Please describe what you find dangerous about applying test-first principles
to an already developed project.

Mike

--
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
http://www.clarkware.com
720.851.2014
